name: Keen Observer
description: Train your senses to spot hidden threats. Gain proficiency in Perception and advantage on checks to detect traps.

name: Battle Instinct
description: Years of drills let you react faster. Gain +1 to initiative rolls and a once-per-combat reroll on a missed attack.

name: Silver Tongue
description: Words can be sharper than blades. Gain proficiency in Persuasion and advantage on social checks after a successful negotiation.
